backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing product management, user profiles, opportunity scoring, keyword research, profit calculation, and seller analysis with access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (category filtering, advanced filters, keyword research, profit calculator) to their corresponding frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries of all frontend TypeScript/React components, hooks, and type definitions describing their functionality in the Amazon seller opportunity finder application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components, charts, and sidebar elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router with routes for dashboard and competitor analysis, wrapped in ThemeProvider with toast notifications.
Filter panel component with inputs for price range, rating slider, review count, and boolean switches for lightweight, non-branded, low FBA, high growth, and high margin filters.
frontend/src/components/AlertHistory.tsx: Scrollable list component displaying alert notifications with icons, titles, messages, timestamps, and read/unread badges.
frontend/src/components/AlertNotificatio: Displays a bell icon button with unread count badge that opens a sheet containing alert history. Uses mock data for opportunity and competition alerts.
frontend/src/components/CategoryFilter.t: Renders a scrollable card with category filter buttons including an 'All Categories' option and individual category buttons with icons. Highlights the selected category.
Displays a static heatmap image showing opportunity distribution across categories with a gradient overlay and descriptive text.
frontend/src/components/CompetitorCard.t: Shows competitor details including rank, seller name, price, rating, reviews, listing quality score, and detected weaknesses as badges.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a footer with copyright notice and attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Main navigation header with logo, theme toggle, subscription tier badge, user profile name, and login/logout button. Handles Internet Identity authentication.
Provides keyword research interface with search input, displays mock metrics (search volume, difficulty, CPC), trend chart, and long-tail keyword suggestions.
frontend/src/components/KeywordTrendChar: Renders a line chart showing 12-month keyword trend data using Recharts library with responsive container.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout wrapper containing Header, AlertNotifications, page content outlet, Footer, and conditionally shows ProfileSetupModal for authenticated users without profiles.
frontend/src/components/LoadingStates.ts: Displays a grid of 6 skeleton loading cards with placeholder content for header, image, and text lines.
frontend/src/components/OpportunityLeade: Shows top 10 products sorted by margin in a scrollable list with rank badges, product titles, categories, prices, and margin percentages.
frontend/src/components/OpportunityScore: Displays an opportunity score as a progress bar with color coding (green/yellow/red) based on score thresholds and numeric value display.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a product card with image, pricing, sales estimates, ratings, competition level, opportunity score meter, and recommendation badge; includes navigation to product details and calculates revenue and rising star status.
frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx: Renders a grid of product cards with sorting controls and category filtering; displays an alert when no products are found.
frontend/src/components/ProductSortContr: Provides a dropdown select control to sort products by score, revenue, competition, or growth.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for first-time user profile setup, collecting name and email, and saving with a free subscription tier.
frontend/src/components/ProfitCalculator: Interactive calculator with input fields for selling price, cost, weight, and ads budget; displays detailed profit breakdown including Amazon fees, FBA fees, and net profit.
frontend/src/components/RecommendationBa: Displays a colored badge with icon indicating product recommendation status (YES, AVOID, or MODERATE).
frontend/src/components/SubscriptionTier: Renders a badge showing user subscription tier (Free, Pro, or Premium) with corresponding icon and styling.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Button component that toggles between light and dark themes with animated sun/moon icons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor with Internet Identity authentication, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout, managing AuthClient lifecycle and identity state with delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductFilters.ts: Custom hook managing advanced product filters state with session storage persistence, including price range, ratings, BSR, revenue, and various boolean preferences.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, products, opportunity scores, and search results using the actor from useActor hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components using HSL color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/CompetitorAnalysis.ts: Displays competitor analysis for a specific product, showing top 10 sellers with mock data including pricing, ratings, and weaknesses.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page with tabs for products, opportunities, heatmap, keywords, and profit calculator; shows hero section for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/types/categories.ts: Exports an array of product categories with associated Lucide icons for use throughout the application.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Utility functions for formatting currency in INR, numbers with Indian notation (Cr/L/K), and dates.
frontend/src/utils/profitCalculations.ts: Calculates Amazon seller profit metrics including referral fees, FBA fees, GST, shipping, and ROI based on product pricing and weight inputs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters and sessionStorage, supporting both regular and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended theme with container settings, custom animations for accordions, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file documenting an Amazon India Seller Opportunity Finder application with full-stack architecture (React/Next.js frontend, Node.js/Python backend, PostgreSQL/MongoDB), existing features for product analysis, filtering, profit calculation, and comprehensive requirements for seller opportunity identification across all Amazon.in categories.
